attributes.action: Change section 1 of the sexual offences act to include men as victims of rape
attributes.additional_details:
For too long men have been victims of rape by women but the stats have been underrepresented due to the nature of the crime of Rape.
With this proposed change, I hope this will encourage male victims of rape by forced penetration by women to come forward and the statistic of rape can be rightfully represented, bringing a more equal society, showing that anyone, Male or Female can not only be raped but can be rapists
attributes.background: I would like the government to add a section to section 1 of the Sexual Offences Act 2003 stating that "A person (a) can commit an offence if they force another person (b) to penetrate their vagina, anus or mouth with their penis"
